activated: You need to make a reservation at least 15 minutes before a session starts.
You can make up to 5 reservations after a completed reservation.
After making a reservation, you can check session's information in "My schedule".
The studio has the right to deny access should you arrive late.
The lattest you can cancel a session is 60 minutes before the session starts. Go to "My schedule" for more details.
Reservations at some studios need to be made thirty minutes to one hour before a session starts. You should be able to find this information at session's details.
Personal ID is required to check-in at some studios. You should be able to find this information at session's details.
The number of sessions you can book at a studio (if limited) will be counted from the first to the last day of a calendar month.
Use advanced filter to select the studios that suits your preferences in location, time, and fitness type.
You can choose to hold off your account one time for 15 days for 3-month package and twice for 6-month package.
Please wear appropriate clothing to participate fitness sessions. The studio has the right to deny access if you violate the studio's dresscode, which can be of disturbance to other customers.
Yoga and Group X schedules will be updated on the app every weekend.
expired: Your WeFit membership has expired. Please extend the membership to continue your training journey with WeFit.
trial: You will still be able to see all of the partners and classes we offer, but you will need to purchase a WeFit membership to join these classes.

promoCodePopup.instructions: Enter a discount/referral code (if any) below

quotes: Don't wish for it. Work for it!
When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
Fit is not a destination. It is a lifestyle.
The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than who you used to be.
Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
You can only fail if you quit.
Life is like exercise. The harder it is, the stronger you become.
A year from now, you are going to wish you had started today.
Working out is a reward, not a punishment.
Whether you think you can or you can't, you're right.
Slow progress is better than no progress.
